name: Trying out https://micropublish.net/ – another online Micropub client besides the Quill one. Great to be able to pick between different ones and this one feels to be especially great for those who constructs their own Micropub endpoints as it very clearly shows what it is going to be posting to the Micropub endpoint. 02 February 2017 by Pelle Wessman Like Share Reply See mentions of this post

content.html: Trying out https://micropublish.net/ – another online Micropub client besides the Quill one. Great to be able to pick between different ones and this one feels to be especially great for those who constructs their own Micropub endpoints as it very clearly shows what it is going to be posting to the Micropub endpoint.
